entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Gimli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 a.m. CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 12. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 13. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023
